review: We love the fire stick. Much faster, and better quality streaming, than our Sony PS, Wii and Xbox.
author: Kristen Knutson "savvyk10"

review: Love it! Easy interface and many apps to use.
author: Van B Huynh

review: I haven't watched my satellite TV since getting this! I've had prime for over 2 years and watch shows and movies on my laptop or kindle and now to watch on my TV!  Very easy to set up and the streaming is great!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Why didn't I buy one sooner. We don't have cable and after we bought this who needs cable. This thing is awesome.
author: Megan

review: Good reception but it really stinks that unlike my Roku it will not allow access to any news,weather, or business info other than a view bloomburg 2 minute clips
author: chick

review: Great for the cost and has tons of apps/movies!
author: Jones2026

review: I'm enjoying it. But have to remember that you will receive all TV shows etc. which are on cable or satellite if you're already subscribed to cable or satellite. And if your not, the good thing is that you can purchase your favorite shows for the entire season at a cheaper rate through Amazon without actually signing on to cable or satellite and getting channels you don't want and paying much more. This is probably confusing.
author: Elaine M. Trudell
